title: Decorative/Design
content:
When I originally used this font, could very well have been a "Letraset" transfer. Thanks in advance for your help.

Font: 

 East Bloc ICG Open Alt 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170220/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

author: ljharp

comments.content:
It looks like an old [1995] Image Club Graphics font: **[East Bloc ICG Open Alt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170220/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Image-Club-Graphics&ffam=EastBlocICG%20OpenAlt%20-%20Regular&fid=fca47309ec601774f3ad43949eb4b8c9&fsize=60&text=tracing&fit=1)** (the alternate version) but I can't find any legitimate sources to acquire it.  
The text set is "tracing" (all in lowercase).
